c74object.name: crow.adsr
c74object.digest: Activate an ADSR envelope on crow.
c74object.description: crow.adsr can be used to activate a velocity sensitive attack-decay-sustain-release envelope by connecting its outlet to the crow object.

objarg.name: output
objarg.description: Specifies which output will generate an envelope.

objarg.name: peak
objarg.digest: Sets the voltage at end of attack (volts)
objarg.description: Sets the voltage at the end of the attack phase. Can be used to create velocity-sensitive envelopes.

objarg.name: attack
objarg.description: Sets the duration of the attack phase in seconds.

objarg.name: decay
objarg.description: Sets the duration of the decay phase in seconds.

objarg.name: sustain
objarg.description: Sets the voltage which is sustained after the decay phase completes.

objarg.name: release
objarg.description: Sets the duration of the release phase in seconds.

method.name: anything
method.description: Any non-zero value activates the envelope. 0 initiates the release phase.

method.name: int
method.description: Any non-zero value activates the envelope. 0 initiates the release phase.
